name: Polytec TC 411
description: Polytec TC 411 is a pasty, two component epoxy with curing at room temperature, used for thermal management in electronics, hybrid technology, sensor technology and power engineering. Polytec TC 411 has a great thermal conductivity and an excellent adhesion to ceramic, glass, semiconductor materials, metals and most plastics. The application can be performed directly from the side-by-side cartridge with a static mixing nozzle, using a dispensing gun.
